```{r}

```


```{r}
#mean reg
meanlm <- lm(amount ~ histavg, data = dhist)
summary(meanlm)
#texreg(meanlm)
```


```{r}
#anon reg
anonlm <- lm(as.logical(is_anonymous) ~ anonpropscreen, data = dhist)
summary(anonlm)
#texreg(anonlm)
```
